sentences.en: "Getting nowhere fast," pronounced Crosby, "that's what we're doing."
sentences.cn: 克罗斯比断言说：“我们一无所获，在做无用功。”

sentences.en: A specialist has now pronounced him fully fit.
sentences.cn: 一位专家已宣布他的身体完全恢复了。

sentences.en: Have I pronounced your name correctly?
He pronounced it Per-sha, the way the English do.
sentences.cn: 他像英格兰人那样将它读成Per-sha。

sentences.en: He pronounced that we were dismissed.
He spoke with a pronounced stutter.
He walked around the garden and pronounced himself satisfied.
sentences.cn: 他绕着花园走了走，说自己很满意。

sentences.en: He walked with a pronounced limp.
Most of the art exhibitions have a pronounced Scottish theme.
sentences.cn: 大多数的艺术展品带有明显的苏格兰风格。

sentences.en: She speaks with a pronounced French accent.
sentences.cn: 她说话有明显的法国口音.

sentences.en: The aquifer which had once fed the wells was pronounced dry.
sentences.cn: 曾为水井供水的蓄水层正式宣告干涸了。

sentences.en: The jeweller pronounced the diamond to be genuine.
sentences.cn: 珠宝商宣称这金刚石是真的.

sentences.en: There were periods of sulking, of pronounced distance, of coldness.
sentences.cn: 沉闷、明显不友好和冷淡的场面多次出现。

sentences.en: This disability is more pronounced in men.
sentences.cn: 这种障碍在男性中表现得更为明显。

words.tran_cn: 读得出的；可发音的；可断言的
发音；宣告；断言（pronounce的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 明显的，显著的，决然的，断然的，强硬的，被说出来的
发音，读(pronounce的过去式和过去分词)，宣布，宣称，断言
